articles.description: Ailing Asset Management Firm Suspended Withdrawals on June 17
articles.title: Maple Provided $10M In Unsecured Loans To Babel Finance

articles.author: Jason Levin
articles.description: Uniswap Labs is planning to integrate NFTs into the largest decentralized exchange via the acquisition of Genie, an NFT marketplace aggregator, according to a post on the company’s website.
articles.title: Uniswap Buys Marketplace Genie to Integrate NFT Trading Into its DEX The acquisition amount was not disclosed.

articles.author: Aleksandar Gilbert
articles.description: BlockFi, a crypto lending platform, has secured a revolving line of credit of $250M with FTX, the second-largest crypto exchange by trading volume, leaders of both companies said Tuesday.
articles.title: ‘All Operations Are Normal’ Says Bankman-Fried as FTX Provides $250M Credit to BlockFi Credit to Be Used 'As Needed'

articles.author: Owen Fernau
articles.description: Synthetix is taking off after a proposal to increase trade speed was approved.
articles.title: Synthetix Now Among Top-Earning Crypto Protocols After Atomic Swaps Take Off

articles.author: Aleksandar Gilbert
articles.description: One of the First DeFi Platforms Takes Fire from DeFi Community
articles.title: Bancor Suspends Impermanent Loss Protection in ‘Hostile Market’  One of the First DeFi Platforms Takes Fire from DeFi Community
